name: Baller Legends – Be A Slam Dunk Basketball Legend
name_original: Baller Legends – Be A Slam Dunk Basketball Legend
description:
BUILD YOUR OWN ROOKIE, CRUSH CHALLENGES, AND DO MONSTER DUNKS!

Can you feel the sweat pouring down your face as you fly through the air and slam dunk? Baller Legends lets you live out your sports fantasies and become a legend in the world of basketball! Shoot hoops and land jaw-dropping dunks to become king of the court.

Swipe to shoot, tap to dunk, and enter the record books as a basketball legend. Travel to diverse locations, upgrade and stylize your rookie, and face challenges that will push you to the limit.

Can you ball with the best?

Try on our NEW customization options! Grab an X-Ray shirt or an Ugly Christmas Sweater, or shoot with the new pumpkin and tie-dye balls!

BALLER LEGENDS FEATURES

GAMEPLAY MODES
Arcade Mode: Ball ‘til you drop in Arcade Mode. Rack up as many points as possible until you miss three shots. Quick to pick up and play, this mode will test your endurance as the shots get progressively harder. Bring the heat with power-ups and dunks to maximize your score.

Challenge Mode: Attack specific objectives to unlock new court options and score big. Some levels have you jam to rapidly score baskets, while others limit you to a few carefully placed shots. Each level has a diverse set of goals that will test your ability to shoot hoops and win under pressure.

LEGENDARY CONTROL
Baller Legends features ultra-precise swipe controls for the most satisfying basketball experience. Whether you’re shooting or going for a big dunk bonus, the precision and rhythm-based control will have you dropping hoops like magic.

AMAZING ENVIRONMENTS
From the concrete and steel of the streets to the sheen of a pro basketball court, you’ll travel the globe as you win games. Each court has new objectives and challenges to complete in Challenge Mode.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BASKETBALL STAR
Want to look like a champion on the court? Choose from 6 characters and multiple basketballs, shoes, shorts and tattoos to customize your character. You’ll be able to select from balls with great accuracy or better power-ups.

SLAM DUNK WITH FRIENDS
Challenge your friends by connecting with Facebook to see who has beaten the hardest level or participate in the global weekly leaderboards.

FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY
Want the ultimate free basketball experience? Now kids and adults alike can live out their court fantasies, totally free!

Got game? Win on 5 different courts with tons of unique challenges, customize your character with unique shoes, tattoos and more, and become a legend as you dunk on addictive basketball games.

Download Baller Legends today - Start your pro baller career and see if you can become a true legend!
